Query.Sentence: WITH FILTER AS ( SELECT UCP.UCP_ID, P.PIL_ID, P.PIL_NAME, P.PIL_SURNAME, P.PIL_PRICE, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, UC.COMP_ID FROM PILOTS P LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON P.PIL_ID = UCP.PIL_ID LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON UCP.UCP_ID = UC.UC_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM FILTER #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH FILTER2 AS ( SELECT UC.COMP_ID, P.PIL_ID, P.PIL_NAME, P.PIL_SURNAME, P.PIL_PRICE, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, UCP.UCP_ID FROM USERS_COMPETITIONS UC RIGHT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID RIGHT JOIN PILOTS P ON P.PIL_ID = UCP.PIL_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM FILTER2 #WHERE# #ORDER#;
